Class Player

java.lang.Object
  Player

public class Player
extends java.lang.Object

Player Class: contains all the game mechanics for the orb object, including its thrusters.

Constructor Detail

Player

public Player()
Constructor of the player class. Initializes the speed values, main position, thruster, bounding circle radius, and the counter.

Method Detail

update

public void update(java.lang.Boolean thrust,
                   java.lang.Boolean slow)
Update the Orb speed and position through the user input. Orb velocity and position depends on the position of the thruster. Also updates the thruster position at the same time

Parameters:
thrust - User input one: tells the thruster to fire (also stop thruster from orbiting)
slow - User input two: Slow the speed of the environment

Parameters:
x - x value of the orb
y - y value of the orb
